section.heading: Voting — Number permitted by each member.

para.text: Each member of an association shall have only one vote, except as may be altered in the articles or bylaws for:
Allocation of votes in a cooperative housing association proportionate to the share of ownership in the association or on the basis of one vote for each unit.
A voting agreement or other device to evade the requirements of this section shall not be enforceable.

annoGroup.heading: Section References
annoGroup.annotation: This section is referenced in § 29-902 and § 29-925.
